dmca.title: [ABUSE] Trademark Misappropriation
dmca.body:
t

________________________________

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com [mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com]
On Behalf Of Libby Hill
Sent: Friday, April 21, 2006 3:35 PM
To: generalmanager@domainsbyproxy.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Trademark Misappropriation



April 21, 2006

 

VIA E-MAIL: generalmanager@domainsbyproxy.com

Original to Follow Via Certified Mail 

 

Domains by Proxy, Inc.

Attn:  Legal Complaints

15111 N. Hayden Road, Suite 160

PMB 353

Scottsdale, AZ  85260

 

Re:       Trademark Misappropriation

            Our File:  10339

 

Dear Sirs:

 

It has come to our attention that a website registered through your company are
unlawfully misappropriating our corporate trademark.  Consequently, we demand that
you immediately take action to remove any and all references to the XanGo(tm)
trademark from this site.

 

Specifically, the website www.xangohealth.com, for which you are listed as
registrant (see enclosed "Whois" information), attempts to capitalize on the
goodwill associated with our XanGo(tm) trademark and profit from the power of our
trademark as a source identifier.           

 

Please be advised that we have protectable rights in the XANGO trademark and these
actions violate a number of federal and state laws, including but not limited to
Section 43 of the Lanham Act, 15 U.S.C.
